feed.title: Deep Learning with Dave
feed.subtitle: My blog on the fastai 'Practical Deep Learning for Coders' course.

entry.title: Chapter 2
entry.summary: My thoughts on the course so far I was surprised at how image recognizers learn to see different patterns in different layers of the CNN (page 34 - 36 in the book). I found it amazing to get an idea of what’s going on inside the model when it is classifying images.

entry.title: Setting up my blog
entry.summary: Choosing between fast_template and fastpages In Appendix A the course book suggests using fast_template. It also suggests looking on the course website for the latest blog recommendations. I couldn’t see any blog recommendations on the course website, so I searched the forum and found a post by Jeremy which mentions fastpages and explains the difference between fast_template and fastpages. It sound like fastpages has all the features of fast_template as well as extra automation and features, so I decided to give it a go.
